entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E23: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/5. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Tóth, Zsolt
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences, evaluation of politicians, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition, political and social self-categorization, economic situation of respondent and of Hungary 2. opinions about EU accession; knowledge and opinions about the government proposal to raise the minimum wage; opinions about the support for families with children, and the planned tax allowance
entry.dcterms:subject: international politics and organisations
political institutions, public administration
social welfare policy and systems
economic policy
economic conditions and indicators
demography
childbearing, family planning and abortion
mass political behavior, attitudes
labour and employment
social behaviour and attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
